name: Platform Platformer!
description:
[[[[[[ WARNING ]]]]]]

This was made in Godot 4. Therefore, it won't work in Firefox for some reason. I've been using Chrome to test and it seems Chrome works fine with it. But there's this guide that *should* fix it in Firefox. I'm not sure, since i haven't tested, but here you go:

https://lunarcandor.itch.io/foxfix

                                                                                                       

Controls:

WASD to move, Mouse to look, P to pause, right click to sprint

In the pause menu is settings for mouse sensitivity and fov.

You may need to click in to get the game focused.

This is just a simple parkour game.

This is gonna stay a webgame, it's easy for me to maintain because i use Linux and it's easiest for all platforms, as opposed to posting a maybe-working windows build and mac build. Also it's more accessible.

I was heavily inspired by this game: https://reestone.itch.io/parkour
